Test Scenario: Successful UPI payment with valid credentials.
Expected Result: Payment successful. Transaction ID generated and displayed. Account balance updated correctly.
Payment failed. Insufficient balance error message displayed. No transaction occurs.

Test Scenario: UPI payment with incorrect UPI ID.
Expected Result: Payment failed. Invalid UPI ID error message displayed. No transaction occurs.
Payment failed. Incorrect PIN error message displayed.  No transaction occurs. Account remains locked after multiple incorrect attempts (if applicable).

Test Scenario: Interrupted UPI payment due to network issue.

Test Data.network_condition: Intermittent connection loss during transaction processing

Expected Result: Payment status uncertain. Appropriate message displayed indicating network issue. Transaction rollback if payment was not completed. No balance deduction if payment failed. Option to retry or check payment status provided.
